description:
Diabal started cooperating with the Faithful of the Hermit in order to escape Piodon`s pursuit and protect his hiding place. Through the realm of consciousness, Sidh, Seth learns that a war has broken out above ground. He hurries back to the surface, but Melie is caught by Dragunov as bait to lure him. Meanwhile, Ocoho leaves the battlefield to follow Mordred and Sagramore... only to find them boarding the Merchant Barons` airship. When she does the same, Mordred reveals a shocking fact.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La mélodie de la destruction, l`invitation en enfer: Harmonizium
Led to the Abyss by a Melody of Death: Harmonizium
Naraku e Sasou Horobi no Shirabe: Harmonizium
奈落へ誘う滅びの調べ -Harmonizium-
